(If Megatrons still at his base) Phobia entered the room planning to 
have a talk with Megatron when he heard him having a discussion with 
someone, he couldn't see who or hear exactly what was said but he 
heard the mention of success and victory, two words he knew well and 
if he could pick the right words he could manipulate for his own use.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia listened to Megatron on the communicator because 
he had 
> left earlier. He called her a logical bot, obviously feeding into 
her ego.
>     "Megatron, I want nothing more than to see the Predacons 
victorious in 
> all things. I know by us joining forces we could make it happen. 
All I ask is 
> I be your sub-commander. If you refuse, I will kill Quickstrike 
now, and take 
> the Darkside files and destroy them." She said, very 
diplomatically. She was 
> dealing with Megatron, and even though in the past they rarely got 
along she 
> knew he was the better leader.
>     Waiting for a response she turned to see the fuzor in the 
shafts agian. 
> "What dose he think this is? A game of cat and mouse? He'll have to 
be 
> immobilized until negotiations are settled. I wouldnt want him to 
do 
> something that might give his fraction the upper hand..." She said.
>     Aracnia, still in the command chair, brought over a keypad. On 
it, she 
> initiated the ventalation patrol sentinels. They were small 
spherical bots 
> who hovered through out the vent. If a foreign object was found 
within the 
> vent, they would use a high powered electrical charge to stun 
whatever it was 
> based on size, weight, and mass. They would keep the fuzor busy at 
least for 
> awhile. After all, such small bots as those were easy to get rid of 
with one 
> good blast. 
>     "That should do the trick. They will swarm him in minutes. As 
for the 
> rat, shes gone I belive. And, just in case she wants to come back 
in...."
>     Aracnia initiated a force feild around the hatch door 
contianing the 
> hole. Darkmouse would need to find another way into the ship is she 
was to 
> rescue her beloved Quickstrike.
